  13. Errors
    1. Warning: -file- is being assigned a //# sourceMappingURL, but already has one
    2. TypeError: invalid Array.prototype.sort argument
    3. Warning: 08/09 is not a legal ECMA-262 octal constant
    4. RangeError: radix must be an integer
    5. SyntaxError: invalid regular expression flag "x"
    6. SyntaxError: return not in function
    7. RangeError: BigInt division by zero
    8. RangeError: BigInt negative exponent
    9. TypeError: X.prototype.y called on incompatible type
    10. ReferenceError: can't access lexical declaration 'X' before initialization
    11. TypeError: can't assign to property "x" on "y": not an object
    12. RangeError: x can't be converted to BigInt because it isn't an integer
    13. TypeError: can't convert BigInt to number
    14. TypeError: can't convert x to BigInt
    15. TypeError: can't define property "x": "obj" is not extensible
    16. TypeError: property "x" is non-configurable and can't be deleted
    17. TypeError: can't redefine non-configurable property "x"
    18. SyntaxError: cannot use `??` unparenthesized within `||` and `&&` expressions
    19. TypeError: cyclic object value
    20. TypeError: can't access dead object
    21. SyntaxError: applying the 'delete' operator to an unqualified name is deprecated
    22. ReferenceError: deprecated caller or arguments usage
    23. Warning: expression closures are deprecated
    24. SyntaxError: "0"-prefixed octal literals and octal escape seq. are deprecated
    25. SyntaxError: Using //@ to indicate sourceURL pragmas is deprecated. Use //# instead
    26. Warning: String.x is deprecated; use String.prototype.x instead
    27. Warning: Date.prototype.toLocaleFormat is deprecated
    28. SyntaxError: test for equality (==) mistyped as assignment (=)?
    29. TypeError: setting getter-only property "x"
    30. SyntaxError: Unexpected '#' used outside of class body
    31. SyntaxError: identifier starts immediately after numeric literal
    32. SyntaxError: illegal character
    33. TypeError: cannot use 'in' operator to search for 'x' in 'y'
    34. RangeError: invalid array length
    35. SyntaxError: invalid assignment left-hand side
    36. SyntaxError: invalid BigInt syntax
    37. TypeError: invalid assignment to const "x"
    38. RangeError: invalid date
    39. SyntaxError: for-in loop head declarations may not have initializers
    40. SyntaxError: a declaration in the head of a for-of loop can't have an initializer
    41. TypeError: invalid 'instanceof' operand 'x'
    42. TypeError: 'x' is not iterable
    43. SyntaxError: JSON.parse: bad parsing
    44. SyntaxError: Malformed formal parameter
    45. URIError: malformed URI sequence
    46. SyntaxError: missing ] after element list
    47. SyntaxError: missing : after property id
    48. SyntaxError: missing } after function body
    49. SyntaxError: missing } after property list
    50. SyntaxError: missing formal parameter
    51. SyntaxError: missing = in const declaration
    52. SyntaxError: missing name after . operator
    53. SyntaxError: missing ) after argument list
    54. SyntaxError: missing ) after condition
    55. SyntaxError: missing ; before statement
    56. TypeError: More arguments needed
    57. RangeError: repeat count must be non-negative
    58. TypeError: "x" is not a non-null object
    59. TypeError: "x" has no properties
    60. SyntaxError: missing variable name
    61. TypeError: can't delete non-configurable array element
    62. RangeError: argument is not a valid code point
    63. TypeError: "x" is not a constructor
    64. TypeError: "x" is not a function
    65. ReferenceError: "x" is not defined
    66. RangeError: precision is out of range
    67. Error: Permission denied to access property "x"
    68. TypeError: "x" is read-only
    69. SyntaxError: redeclaration of formal parameter "x"
    70. TypeError: Reduce of empty array with no initial value
    71. SyntaxError: "x" is a reserved identifier
    72. RangeError: repeat count must be less than infinity
    73. Warning: unreachable code after return statement
    74. SyntaxError: "use strict" not allowed in function with non-simple parameters
    75. InternalError: too much recursion
    76. ReferenceError: assignment to undeclared variable "x"
    77. ReferenceError: reference to undefined property "x"
    78. SyntaxError: Unexpected token
    79. TypeError: "x" is (not) "y"
    80. SyntaxError: function statement requires a name
    81. SyntaxError: unparenthesized unary expression can't appear on the left-hand side of '**'
    82. SyntaxError: unterminated string literal
  14. Plus

value.content: Le guide JavaScript illustre comment utiliser JavaScript et fournit un aperçu des fonctionnalités du langage. Pour des informations exhaustives à propos des fonctionnalités du langage, voir la référence JavaScript.

value.title: Chapitres
value.content: Ce guide est divisé en plusieurs chapitres :

value.title: Introduction
value.content:
• À propos de ce guide
  • À propos de JavaScript
  • JavaScript et Java
  • ECMAScript
  • Les outils
  • Hello World

value.title: Grammaire et types
value.content:
• Syntaxe de base et commentaires
  • Déclarations
  • Portées des variables
  • Remontée des variables
  • Structures de données et types
  • Littéraux

  • Arguments et paramètres
  • Fonctions fléchées

value.title: Formatage du texte
value.content:
• Littéraux de chaînes de caractères

  • Littéraux de gabarits
  • Internationalisation
  • Expressions rationnelles
